cstor_name.label: cStor
cstor_name.name: cstor_name
cstor_name.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_application_port" with KEY = "cstor_name"

cstor_ip.label: cStor IP
cstor_ip.name: cstor_ip
cstor_ip.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_application_port" with KEY = "cstor_ip" where "cstor_name" =~ /^$cstor_name$/

network_monitor.label: Network Monitor
network_monitor.name: network_monitor
network_monitor.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_application_port" with KEY = "network_monitor_name" WHERE "cstor_name"=~ /^$cstor_name$/

ipa.description: Match beginning: ^; Match ending: $; List: |, Match all: empty, ., or .*
ipa.label: ipA *
ipa.name: ipa

flow_metric_graph_variable.label: Graph metrics:
flow_metric_graph_variable.name: flow_metric
flow_metric_graph_variable.query: Bytes : sum("bytes"), Throughput : 8000*sum("bytes")/$__interval_ms, Packets : sum("packets"), Flows : max("flows"), Fragments : sum("fragments"), MTU : max("max_mtu")

value: sum("bytes") as "Bytes", sum("bytes_a") as "Bytes A->B", sum("bytes_b") as "Bytes B->A"
sum("fragments") as "Fragments", sum("fragments_a") as "Fragments A->B", sum("fragments_b") as "Fragments B->A"

flow_metric_table_variable.label: Table metrics:
flow_metric_table_variable.name: flow_metric_table

options.value: sum("bytes") as "Bytes", sum("bytes_a") as "Bytes A->B", sum("bytes_b") as "Bytes B->A"
sum("packets") as "Packets", sum("packets_a") as "Packets A->B", sum("packets_b") as "Packets B->A"
sum("fragments") as "Fragments", sum("fragments_a") as "Fragments A->B", sum("fragments_b") as "Fragments B->A"
max("flows") as "Flows",max("flows_a") as "Flows A->B",max("flows_b") as "Flows B->A"
Max("max_mtu") as "MTU",max("max_mtu_a") as "MTU A->B", max("max_mtu_b") as "MTU B->A"

flow_metric_table_variable.query: Throughput : 8*sum("bytes")/(${__to:date:seconds}-${__from:date:seconds}) as "Throughput"\, 8*sum("bytes_a")/(${__to:date:seconds}-${__from:date:seconds}) as "Throughput A->B"\, 8*sum("bytes_b")/(${__to:date:seconds}-${__from:date:seconds}) as "Throughput B->A", Bytes : sum("bytes") as "Bytes"\, sum("bytes_a") as "Bytes A->B"\, sum("bytes_b") as "Bytes B->A", Packets : sum("packets") as "Packets"\, sum("packets_a") as "Packets A->B"\, sum("packets_b") as "Packets B->A",  Fragments :  sum("fragments") as "Fragments"\, sum("fragments_a") as "Fragments A->B"\, sum("fragments_b") as "Fragments B->A", Flows : max("flows") as "Flows"\,max("flows_a") as "Flows A->B"\,max("flows_b") as "Flows B->A", MTU : Max("max_mtu") as "MTU"\,max("max_mtu_a") as "MTU A->B"\, max("max_mtu_b") as "MTU B->A"

flow_conversation_ip_info.label: Show IP Info:
flow_conversation_ip_info.name: ip_info
flow_conversation_ip_info.query: Outer VLAN : vlan_tag_outer, Inner VLAN : vlan_tag_inner, IP Protocol : ip_protocol_name, Network Application : application_port, Hosts Group : hosts_group_a\,hosts_group_b, Custom Application : custom_application_a\,custom_application_b, IP Type : ip_type_a\,ip_type_b, SNI Name : tls_domain_a\,tls_domain_b, Canonical Name : cname_domain_a\,cname_domain_b, Reverse DNS : rdns_domain_a\,rdns_domain_b, Country : country_a\,country_b, City : city_a\,city_b

targets.query: SELECT ${flow_metric:raw} FROM "flows_summary_ip" WHERE  ("ip" =~/$tag/) AND ("${filter1:raw}" =~ /^${filter1_value}$/) AND ("${filter2:raw}" =~ /^${filter2_value}$/) AND ("${filter3:raw}" =~ /^${filter3_value}$/) AND ("ip" !~ /$singleton_ips/ ${singleton_filter:raw} true) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "ip" fill(none)

SELECT ${flow_metric_table:raw} FROM "flows_summary_ip" WHERE  ("ip" =~ /$tag/) AND ("${filter1:raw}" =~ /^${filter1_value}$/) AND ("${filter2:raw}" =~ /^${filter2_value}$/) AND ("${filter3:raw}" =~ /^${filter3_value}$/)  AND ("ip" !~ /$singleton_ips/ ${singleton_filter:raw} true) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  "ip", ${ip_info:raw}  fill(none)

tcp_metric_graph_variable.label: Graph metrics:
tcp_metric_graph_variable.name: tcp_metric

options.value: Max("mtu_client") as "Client MTU", Max("mtu_server") as "Server MTU"
MAX("bytes_client_session") as "Client Session Bytes", Max("bytes_server_session") as "Server Session Bytes"
MAX("packets_client_session") as "Client Session Packets", MAX("packets_server_session") as "Server Session Packets"
MIN("min_win_client_session") AS "Client MinWin", MIN("min_win_server_session") as "Server MinWin"
Max("mtu_client_session") as "Client MTU", Max("mtu_server_session") as "Server MTU"

tcp_metric_graph_variable.query: Throughput : 8000*(SUM("bytes_server")+SUM("bytes_client"))/$__interval_ms as "Throughput", Bytes : SUM("bytes_server")+SUM("bytes_client") as "Bytes", Packets : SUM("packets_server")+SUM("packets_client") as "Packets",Active Sessions : MAX("active_sessions") as "Active Sessions", Response Time : MEAN("response_time_s") as "Response Time", Round Trip Time : MEAN("rtt_client_s") as "Client RTT"\,MEAN("rtt_server_s") as "Server RTT", Zero Windows : SUM("zwins_client")+SUM("zwins_server") as "Zero Windows", Retransmissions : SUM("retransmissions_client")+SUM("retransmissions_server") as "Retransmissions", Fragments : SUM("fragments_server")+sum("fragments_client") as "Fragments", Duplicates : SUM("duplicates_client")+SUM("duplicates_server") as "Duplicates", Gaps : SUM("gaps_client")+SUM("gaps_server") as "Gaps", Sequence Errors : SUM("sequence_errors_client")+SUM("sequence_errors_server") as "Sequence Errors", MTU : Max("mtu_client") as "Client MTU"\, Max("mtu_server") as "Server MTU", SYNs : SUM("syns") as "SYNs", SYNACKs : SUM("synacks") as "SYNACKs", FINs : SUM("fins_client")+SUM("fins_server") as "FINs", Resets : SUM("resets_client")+SUM("resets_server") as "Resets", Completed Handshakes : Sum("connection_established") as "Completed Handshakes", Finished Sessions : Sum("finished_sessions") as "Finished Sessions", Open Sessions : Max("active_sessions") as "Open Sessions", Session Bytes : MAX("bytes_client_session") as "Client Session Bytes"\, Max("bytes_server_session") as "Server Session Bytes", Session Packets : MAX("packets_client_session") as "Client Session Packets"\, MAX("packets_server_session") as "Server Session Packets", Session Duration : MAX("duration_s") as "Session Duration", Session Idle Time : Max("idle_s") as "Session Idle Time", Response Time(open) : MAX("response_time_s") AS "Response Time",Missing SYNs : SUM("missing_syns") as "Missing SYNs", SYN Failures : SUM("syn_failures") as "SYN Failures", Min Wins : MIN("min_win_client_session") AS "Client MinWin"\, MIN("min_win_server_session") as "Server MinWin",  MTU(open) : Max("mtu_client_session") as "Client MTU"\, Max("mtu_server_session") as "Server MTU", Zero Byte Sessions : SUM("zero_bytes_sessions") as "Zero Byte Sessions"

tcp_metric_ts_variable.label: Table metrics (ts):
tcp_metric_ts_variable.name: tcp_ts_metric

options.value: Max("mtu_client") as "Client MTU", Max("mtu_server") as "Server MTU"

tcp_metric_ts_variable.query: Throughput : 8*(SUM("bytes_server")+SUM("bytes_client"))/(${__to:date:seconds}-${__from:date:seconds}) as "Throughput", Bytes : SUM("bytes_server")+SUM("bytes_client") as "Bytes", Packets : SUM("packets_server")+SUM("packets_client") as "Packets", Response Time : MEAN("response_time_s") as "Response Time", Round Trip Time : MEAN("rtt_client_s") as "Client RTT"\,MEAN("rtt_server_s") as "Server RTT",  SYNs : SUM("syns") as "SYNs", SYNACKs : SUM("synacks") as "SYNACKs", FINs : SUM("fins_client")+SUM("fins_server") as "FINs", Resets : SUM("resets_client")+SUM("resets_server") as "Resets", Retransmissions : SUM("retransmissions_client")+SUM("retransmissions_server") as "Retransmissions", Duplicates : SUM("duplicates_client")+SUM("duplicates_server") as "Duplicates", Gaps : SUM("gaps_client")+SUM("gaps_server") as "Gaps", Sequence Errors : SUM("sequence_errors_client")+SUM("sequence_errors_server") as "Sequence Errors", Fragments : SUM("fragments_server")+sum("fragments_client") as "Fragments", MTU : Max("mtu_client") as "Client MTU"\, Max("mtu_server") as "Server MTU", Zero Windows : SUM("zwins_client")+SUM("zwins_server") as "Zero Windows", Finished Sessions : Sum("finished_sessions") as "Finished Sessions"

value: MAX("bytes_client_session") as "Client Session Bytes", Max("bytes_server_session") as "Server Session Bytes"

tcp_metric_open_variable.label: Table metrics (open):
tcp_metric_open_variable.name: tcp_open_metric

options.value: MAX("bytes_client_session") as "Client Session Bytes", Max("bytes_server_session") as "Server Session Bytes"
MAX("packets_client_session") as "Client Session Packets", MAX("packets_server_session") as "Server Session Packets"
MIN("min_win_client_session") AS "Client MinWin", MIN("min_win_server_session") as "Server MinWin"
Max("mtu_client_session") as "Client MTU", Max("mtu_server_session") as "Server MTU"

tcp_metric_open_variable.query: Session Bytes : MAX("bytes_client_session") as "Client Session Bytes"\, Max("bytes_server_session_max") as "Server Session Bytes", Session Packets : MAX("packets_client_session") as "Client Session Packets"\, MAX("packets_server_session") as "Server Session Packets", Session Duration : MAX("duration_s") as "Session Duration", Session Idle Time : Max("idle_s") as "Session Idle Time", Completed Handshakes : Sum("connection_established") as "Completed Handshakes",  SYN Failures : SUM("syn_failures") as "SYN Failures", Missing SYNs : SUM("missing_syns") as "Missing SYNs", Open Sessions : Max("active_sessions") as "Open Sessions", Min Wins : MIN("min_win_client_session") AS "Client MinWin"\, MIN("min_win_server_session") as "Server MinWin",  MTU(open) : Max("mtu_client_session") as "Client MTU"\, Max("mtu_server_session") as "Server MTU", Zero Byte Sessions : SUM("zero_bytes_sessions") as "Zero Byte Sessions"

targets.query: SELECT ${tcp_metric:raw} FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_client_ip" WHERE "cstor_name" =~ /^$cstor_name$/ AND "network_monitor_name" =~ /^$network_monitor$/ AND "ip" =~ /$ip/ AND ("ip" !~ /$singleton_ips/ ${singleton_filter:raw} true) ${filter}  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "cstor_name", "network_monitor_name", "ip" fill(none)

SELECT ${tcp_metric:raw} FROM "tcp_open_summary_client_ip" WHERE "cstor_name" =~ /^$cstor_name$/ AND "network_monitor_name" =~ /^$network_monitor$/ AND "ip" =~ /$ip/  AND ("ip" !~ /$singleton_ips/ ${singleton_filter:raw} true)  ${filter}  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "cstor_name", "network_monitor_name", "ip" fill(none)

ts_table_apply_as_filter.description: Click on the Server IP column to open a dashboard with IP conversations for the selected Server IP.

targets.query:
SELECT ${tcp_open_metric:raw} FROM "tcp_open_summary_server_ip" 
 WHERE ("cstor_name" =~ /^$cstor_name$/ AND "network_monitor_name" =~ /^$network_monitor$/)  AND "ip" =~ /$ip/ AND ("ip" !~ /$singleton_ips/ ${singleton_filter:raw} true) ${filter} AND $timeFilter 
 GROUP BY "ip", ${ip_info:raw} fill(none)

ts_table_apply_as_filter.title: Server - Open Session

open_table_apply_as_filter.description: Click on the Client IP column to open a dashboard with IP conversations for the selected Client IP.

targets.query:
SELECT ${tcp_open_metric:raw} FROM "tcp_open_summary_client_ip" 
 WHERE ("cstor_name" =~ /^$cstor_name$/ AND "network_monitor_name" =~ /^$network_monitor$/)  AND "ip" =~ /$ip/ AND ("ip" !~ /$singleton_ips/ ${singleton_filter:raw} true) ${filter}  AND $timeFilter 
 GROUP BY "ip", ${ip_info:raw} fill(none)

open_table_apply_as_filter.title: Client - Open Session
